sourcesContent:
import './statics/css/AppLogin.css' import username_logo from './statics/images/username.svg' import password_logo from './statics/images/password.svg' import form_background from './statics/images/form_background.svg' import anime from 'animejs' import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react' var AppLogin = props=>{ let ref = useRef({}) useEffect(()=>{ ref.current['username'].style.backgroundImage = `url(${username_logo})` ref.current['password'].style.backgroundImage = `url(${password_logo})` ref.current['form'].style.backgroundImage = `url(${form_background})` anime({ targets:ref.current['heading'], filter:['blur(0px)' , 'blur(20px)'], duration:5000, autoplay:true, direction:'alternate', loop:true }) },[ref]) return (
ref.current['form'] = el}>

ref.current['heading'] =el} >Login

ref.current['username']= el} placeholder = 'Username or Email' /> ref.current['password']=el} placeholder= "Password" />
) } export default AppLogin;
